data.title: Add IReadOnlyList
data.body: Similar to the IReadOnlyDictionary. It can be used as a return type instead of List or IList when the value should not be modified.

data.title: Unarmed units should not move when told to attack with a group.
data.body:
If an unarmed unit is selected with a group that is then told to attack, the unarmed unit should do nothing, or simple ignore the attack order and continue what it was doing?
## <bountysource-plugin>

Want to back this issue? **[Post a bounty on it!](https://www.bountysource.com/issues/2439617-unarmed-units-should-not-move-when-told-to-attack-with-a-group?utm_campaign=plugin&utm_content=tracker%2F36085&utm_medium=issues&utm_source=github)** We accept bounties via [Bountysource](https://www.bountysource.com/?utm_campaign=plugin&utm_content=tracker%2F36085&utm_medium=issues&utm_source=github).
</bountysource-plugin>

data.title: Replaced open-ra.org with openra.net in-game
data.body:
- [x] http://www.openra.net :+1: 
- [x] http://wiki.openra.net :+1: 
- [x] http://bugs.openra.net :+1: 
- [x] http://resource.openra.net :+1: 
- [ ] http://master.openra.net :no_entry_sign:

data.title: Map preview generation
data.body:
Fixes a thread synchronization problem with the sheetbuilder and the map preview generation. It was not apparent previously because of the 50ms delay. This also improves the speed of the preview generation.

See also: #5503 for an alternative.

data.title: Cache some dictionary lookups
data.body: Nothing complex. Just avoiding some repeated work in FrozenUnderFog.Tick since it gets called a lot.

data.title: Faster map preview generation.
data.body:
Some changes that make map generation fast enough to look mostly instant.

One change was to no longer show the placeholder widget in the preview. I've just removed it in code but if there's a more sensible place to remove it (a template somewhere?) could you point me towards it.

Resolves #3732 by just making the delay a non-issue.

data.title: Support beacon polish fixes.
data.body:
Fixes #5455, and adds a clock overlay which shows the remaining delay:

![beacons](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/167819/3138449/00a527ee-e88f-11e3-8f7d-7638eb4a9169.png)

data.title: Not able to surrender in singleplayer missions
data.body: Tested with allies-01-classic and allies-02-classic (also appeared in my allies-04-classic map). As well, the surrender button does not disapear, when game is "finished" ( #5499 ?).

data.title: Change ingame urls to use openra.net
Single Player mission won't end
data.body: I've tried the latest playtest (20140525) and it looks like at least the for the first single player c&c mission it is not possible to end it successfully - when fulfilling all mission objectives the game just goes into "pause" mode and won't continue. The only available options to me are manually quiting the game.

data.title: Fixed KeyNotFoundException in ServerBrowser
data.body: As described in #5492. Happens when resource site is sending invalid data such as an error page. Therefore, dump the received data into debug.log for investigation.

data.title: Fixed automatic map upload not refreshing map rule status
data.body: https://github.com/OpenRA/OpenRA/pull/5353 did regress https://github.com/OpenRA/OpenRA/pull/4901 as described in https://github.com/OpenRA/OpenRA/issues/5479.

data.title: Added missing upgrade rules for the previous old stable release
data.body: as described in https://github.com/OpenRA/OpenRA/issues/5464.

data.title: Make date and time format configurable
data.body:
As was discussed in #5279, mono can't read locale settings on linux correctly. This makes the date and time of news posts appear in incorrect format. So either it should be configurable in the settings menu or openra should read this information by itself, without relying on mono's methods.
## <bountysource-plugin>

Want to back this issue? **[Post a bounty on it!](https://www.bountysource.com/issues/2422532-make-date-and-time-format-configurable?utm_campaign=plugin&utm_content=tracker%2F36085&utm_medium=issues&utm_source=github)** We accept bounties via [Bountysource](https://www.bountysource.com/?utm_campaign=plugin&utm_content=tracker%2F36085&utm_medium=issues&utm_source=github).
</bountysource-plugin>

data.title: Try to avoid a System.Collections.Generic.KeyNotFoundException
data.body: When executing Game.modData.MapCache.QueryRemoteMapDetails from ServerBrowserLogic.

data.title: Infantry staying on water
data.body:
As the title says, it's possible to make infantry staying on water:
Send some paradrops on a brigde and destroy the bridge,
after the paradrops jumped out of the badger.
They will land on the water, unable to move, but they don't die.
If you repair the bridge, you'll be able to move them again.

data.title: Crash during loading serverlist
data.body:
While trying to find a game on the latest playtest, the game crashed while loading the serverlist.

Playtest is now unplayable for me, as this happens every time now. Tried 5 times, but every time I get the same exception.

```
Red Alert Mod at Version playtest-20140525
Operating System: Windows (Microsoft Windows NT 6.1.7601 Service Pack 1)
Runtime Version: .NET CLR 4.0.30319.18444
Exception of type `System.Collections.Generic.KeyNotFoundException`: The given key was not present in the dictionary.
   at System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary`2.get_Item(TKey key)
   at OpenRA.MapCache.<QueryRemoteMapDetails>c__AnonStorey42.<>m__62(DownloadDataCompletedEventArgs i, Boolean cancelled)
   at OpenRA.Download.<Download>c__AnonStorey3C.<>m__2D(Object _, DownloadDataCompletedEventArgs a)
   at System.Net.DownloadDataCompletedEventHandler.Invoke(Object sender, DownloadDataCompletedEventArgs e)
   at System.Net.WebClient.OnDownloadDataCompleted(DownloadDataCompletedEventArgs e)
   at System.Net.WebClient.DownloadDataOperationCompleted(Object arg)
   at System.Threading.QueueUserWorkItemCallback.WaitCallback_Context(Object state)
   at System.Threading.ExecutionContext.RunInternal(ExecutionContext executionContext, ContextCallback callback, Object state, Boolean preserveSyncCtx)
   at System.Threading.ExecutionContext.Run(ExecutionContext executionContext, ContextCallback callback, Object state, Boolean preserveSyncCtx)
   at System.Threading.QueueUserWorkItemCallback.System.Threading.IThreadPoolWorkItem.ExecuteWorkItem()
   at System.Threading.ThreadPoolWorkQueue.Dispatch()
   at System.Threading._ThreadPoolWaitCallback.PerformWaitCallback()
```

data.title: Add support for Ogg Vorbis
data.body:
Adding support for Ogg Vorbis would go a long way to increasing the flexibility, ease of modding, and decreasing file size. Adding Ogg Vorbis support will not only reduce file sizes on Music, it will also allow for better quality sounds.

See also:
#5487
#5482

data.title: Port missions to the new Lua API
data.body:
The new https://github.com/OpenRA/OpenRA/wiki/Lua-API has landed in https://github.com/OpenRA/OpenRA/pull/5190. Time to update the maps and enhance the standard library. Some shared deficiencies of both old and new Lua API:
- [x] #4400 Missing cell triggers
- [x] #4541 Lua integration of objectives panel 
## Red Alert

data.title: Simplify MoveAdjacentTo logic.
data.body: Extracted from #4469, which I plan on reopening after the feature freeze is over. Fixes #5445.

data.title: Convert all AUD files to Ogg Vorbis to save filespace
data.body:
In our IRC channel, while discussing the merits of #5482, I decided to run an experiment on the file size of .ogg files compared to .aud files. The results are.. surprising.

Scores.mix in WAV: 455839310 Bytes
Scores.mix in AUD: 115390752 Bytes
Scores.mix in Ogg: 82047047 Bytes

Based on this, Ogg is a superior compression method to AUD. As a bonus, it is easier to use and modify, supporting our nature.

<bountysource-plugin>

---

Want to back this issue? **[Place a bounty on it!](https://www.bountysource.com/issues/2397498-convert-all-aud-files-to-ogg-vorbis-to-save-filespace?utm_campaign=plugin&utm_content=tracker%2F36085&utm_medium=issues&utm_source=github)** We accept bounties via [Bountysource](https://www.bountysource.com/?utm_campaign=plugin&utm_content=tracker%2F36085&utm_medium=issues&utm_source=github).
</bountysource-plugin>

data.title: Add a button to locate active or primary production buildings
data.body:
Under each production tab there could be a button which says locate active/primary building and when pressed, that building would be centered on the screen and selected. It would be useful when there are lots of bases scattered around the map.
## <bountysource-plugin>

Want to back this issue? **[Post a bounty on it!](https://www.bountysource.com/issues/2395122-add-a-button-to-locate-active-or-primary-production-buildings?utm_campaign=plugin&utm_content=tracker%2F36085&utm_medium=issues&utm_source=github)** We accept bounties via [Bountysource](https://www.bountysource.com/?utm_campaign=plugin&utm_content=tracker%2F36085&utm_medium=issues&utm_source=github).
</bountysource-plugin>

data.title: Remove managed & unmanaged binaries from the tree
data.body: I'm talking about the files in [thirdparty](https://github.com/OpenRA/OpenRA/tree/bleed/thirdparty). They're nice for packaging but they have no place in a source tree.

data.title: Improved efficiency of startup methods.
data.body:
Some changes that aim to improve startup speed. I loaded each mod without any crashes as a test.

On the RA shellmap I see the time for StartGame reduced from 6211 ms to 4379 ms on initial load (average of 3 runs).

data.title: Add a lua-powered single-player mission
data.body: So, people on IRC have asked me to file a PR for this map. Here it is, enjoy!

data.title: Allow the downloading of stereo .ogg files instead of poor quality .aud files
data.body: Related to #5304 and #4759, instead of shipping poor quality .aud files from the downloads, we should instead ship stereo .ogg files from either the soundtracks or Frank Klepacki's Website. We should of course ask Frank Klepacki first before actually attempting this.

data.title: Small Correction to one of the music names.
data.body: Taken from Frank Klepacki's Website.

data.title: Fixed concrete having the same radar color as sand
data.body: it is confusing.

data.title: Automatic map download does not finish
data.body:
If you click install it will download it, but the lobby does not refresh the state after doing so.

![d2k-lobby-download-fail](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/756669/3103737/a47a1428-e65b-11e3-911a-17dfafafb0b5.png)

You have to rejoin the game to complete it otherwise the server will kick you on game start.
